backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user roles, school and user data models, access control checks, and profile management helpers and queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for environment‑variable configuration updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text listing concise summaries for core frontend files, mainly the exam generator and dashboard system.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required and optional LLM API variables for local development without secrets.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignores local environment files to prevent committing sensitive API keys.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining an amber/green OKLCH color theme for light/dark modes and global UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/LLM_DEMO_SETUP.md: Documentation explaining how to configure local LLM API credentials and environment variables for demo features.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theme, query client, Internet Identity provider, and rendering AppShell.
frontend/src/app/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated app container handling login, profile onboarding, and routing to dashboards or feature pages based on role.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with branding and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with role-based navigation, user menu, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI using Internet Identity with a welcome message and feature list.
frontend/src/features/auth/useGetCallerU: Hook that fetches the current user's profile with proper loading state handling.
frontend/src/features/auth/useSaveCaller: Mutation hook to save or update the caller's user profile and refresh cached data.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/parent/: Parent dashboard showing linked students and their progress with selection and loading states.
Hooks to fetch linked students, their progress, and weekly summary for the parent dashboard.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/student: Student dashboard displaying weekly progress metrics and recent activity with quick actions.
Hooks to fetch student progress and weekly summary data for the student dashboard.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/buil: Builds a deterministic user prompt string from exam generation inputs, formatting board, syllabus, and exam specs.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/Exam: Main UI for configuring and generating AI-powered exam papers, including form inputs and preview.
Thin wrapper that mounts the Exam Generator page in the routing system.
Displays a generated exam paper with metadata and grouped questions, optionally showing answers.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/exam: Defines TypeScript types and validation guards for exam paper JSON structures, including metadata and questions.
Provides the system prompt enforcing JSON-only exam generation rules, curriculum alignment, and question constraints.
Contains frontend-only types for exam requests, syllabus scope, and board enums used when triggering exam generation.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/gene: Coordinates building prompts, calling the LLM API, and parsing responses to produce a validated exam paper result.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/llmC: Loads and validates environment-based LLM API configuration and builds chat completion request payloads.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/pars: Parses LLM output as JSON, validates schema and mark totals, and returns structured exam paper results with errors if invalid.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/useG: React Query mutation hook that triggers exam paper generation via backend actor and handles result states.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: UI page for new users to enter profile details and submit them via create-profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useCrea: Mutation hook to create a user profile through the backend actor and refresh cached profile data.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useGetS: React Query hook fetching available schools from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/tutor/buildTutorUs: Builds a structured user prompt for the tutor LLM using grade, subject, topic, and question.
frontend/src/features/tutor/generateTuto: Validates LLM config and sends a chat completion request using tutor-specific prompts to generate responses.
frontend/src/features/tutor/TutorPage.ts: React page for students to input tutoring questions, call the LLM for answers, and optionally save session results.
frontend/src/features/tutor/tutorSystemP: Defines the system prompt guiding the AI Tutor’s tone, structure, and educational standards.
frontend/src/features/tutor/useRecordTut: React Query mutation for saving tutoring session metadata via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity management using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting centralized query organization; exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles and theme variables defining the app’s light/dark color schemes and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, and animations, adding custom colors, fonts, shadows, and accordion keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature specs for an AI Tutor app with exams, billing, and LLM integration.
